title: Great movie!
review: Finally a great thriller without hollywoodian cliches. It's a fantastic movie!

title: Disapointed
review: I'm a Marvel and Spiderman fan, but this movie was actually borring. Ratings of 10 are just as wrong as the many 1's. This is an objective 6. And I'm angry that I was fooled to watch it.

title: great science fiction movie, also a tough one
review: Beautiful movie, great sci fi idea. Not recommended for people without a solid and quality sci-fi background.
